name: AJ's Country Dash
description:
Hey Guys ! This is my First game ever. Its an infinite runner that I created on Unreal engine. It follows Aj on his adventure through the floating country side as he collects coins. The objective is to collect as much coins as you can and beat your previous score. The basic keys to you use are:

A = Left Turn

D = Right Turn

P = Pause

I hope you enjoy!
